code: import{applyMiddleware,compose,createStore}from"redux";import createSagaMiddleware from"@redux-saga/core";import reducer from'./reducers/index';import rootSaga from"./sagas";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancers=typeof window==='object'&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__({}):compose;var configureStore=function configureStore(preloadedState){return createStore(reducer,preloadedState,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));};var store=configureStore({});sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
